name: note-taking-apps
description: Poll about favorite note-taking apps during the job hunt.

events.content: Need a note-taking app to keep track of interviews. Obsidian? Notion? Plain Google Docs?
Obsidian for offline speed + linking. I have a template with company, interviewer, and follow-up tasks.
Notion database for meâ€”syncs across devices and I can share with friends for feedback.
I stay old school with a markdown repo. Whatever you pick, keep the format consistent.
